full_summary:
### Motor, Pneumatic

#### Notice Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: W8482-253231/A
*   **Publication Date**: November 21, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 6, 2024, 2:00:00 PM
*   **Currency**: Canadian Dollar
*   **Tender Status**: Open
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Description

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for **MOTOR, PNEUMATIC**,.quantity 1, Unit of issue: EA, with delivery to CFB Halifax. Bidders are expected to provide prices in Canadian dollars; bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

The procurement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services. The requirement details can be found in the attached tender notice documents.

For bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product, the brand name, model or part number, and NCAGE must be clearly indicated.

Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

#### Contact Information

*   **Name**: Ashley Tarp
*   **Email**: [Ashley.Nadeau-Weeks@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Ashley.Nadeau-Weeks@forces.gc.ca)
*   **Phone**: (555) 555-5555
*   **Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2

#### Additional Information

*   **Attachment**: [PDF document] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52372/w8482-253231---hpr-rfp-eng.pdf (available in English)
*   **Attachment**: [PDF document] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52372/w8482-253231---hpr-rfp-fr.pdf (available in French)

Please submit your proposal according to the bidding requirements as outlined in the attached tender notice file. If you have any questions or require clarification, please contact Ashley Tarp at the provided address.

Note: This project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
